Many entries can be use. The entries are decoded in UTF-8. booktools.import.bibtex.foundnothing=No entry was found.

booktools.error.invalid-date=The field must be empty or a valid date YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/YYYY, YYYY-MM/YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD/YYYY-MM-DD. booktools.error.empty-id=Id can not be empty. booktools.error.id-already-exists=This id already exists. booktools.error.invalid-id-format=The id can only contain lower case letters, upper case letters, numbers, :, -, . and _. The id length must be between 2 and 50.
